entry.title: What is competitive programming?
entry.summary: In competitive programming, competitors are given a set of programming problems to solve within a given time period. The competitor who solved the most number of problems or has accumulated the highest score is declared as the winner. Just like in sports or games, competitors need to practice in order â€¦
entry.content: In competitive programming, competitors are given a set of programming problems to solve within a given time period. The competitor who solved the most number of problems or has accumulated the highest score is declared as the winner. Just like in sports or games, competitors need to practice in order to win.

entry.title: Welcome!
entry.content: We will be holding a recruitment contest soon..
